name: drpbx-fetcher
description: Sync files from Dropbox folders to your Obsidian vault

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node auto-version-bump.mjs && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp versions.json dist/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Jeroen de Zwart
